Class Door

java.lang.Object
Obstacles
Door
public class Door extends Obstacles
Door which can be locked or unlocked, allows the player to move to the room it's connected to

    • Door

      public Door(bagel.util.Point position, String toRoomName, Room rooms)
      Initialize the door into the scene
      Parameters:
      position - Determines the position within the scene
      toRoomName - Determine which room the door leads to (String)
      rooms - Determine which room the door is located in. (String)

    • Door

      public Door(bagel.util.Point position, String toRoomName, Room rooms, BattleRoom battleRoom)
      Second constructor to initialize door into scene with more parameters
      Parameters:
      position - Determines the position within the scene
      toRoomName - Determine which room the door leads to (String)
      rooms - Determine which room the door is located in. (String)
      battleRoom - Current BattleRoom
